text: Wilfred de Souza (23 April 1927 - 4 September 2015) was an Indian surgeon and politician. He served as the Chief Minister of Goa three times; 18 May 1993 until 2 April 1994, 8 April 1994 until 16 December 1994 and 30 July 1998 until 26 November 1998. De Souza was born in Kampala, Uganda. He grew up in Goa. He was a Roman Catholic. De Souza died after a short illness on 4 September 2015 in Panaji, aged 88. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Politicians from Goa Category:Roman Catholics Category:Indian physicians
title: Wilfred de Souza
